      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">The Haber process for making ammonia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Haber Prozeß für das Bilden des Ammoniaks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le procédé de Haber pour préparer l'ammoniaque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O processo de Haber para fazer a amônia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il procedimento di Haber per la preparazione 
dell'ammoniaca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαδικασία Haber για την αμμωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El proceso de Haber para hacer el amoníaco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the Haber process for making ammonia using nitrogen from the air and hydrogen from methane gas in a reaction vessel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fertilisers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Haber process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction vessel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt den Haber Prozeß für das 
Bilden des Ammoniaks mit Stickstoff von der Luft und vom Wasserstoff 
vom Methangas in einem Reaktion Behälter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre le procédé de Haber pour 
préparer l'ammoniaque en utilisant l'azote à partir de l'air et de 
l'hydrogène du gaz de méthane dans un navire de réaction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra o processo de Haber para 
fazer a amônia usando o nitrogênio do ar e do hidrogênio do gás de
methane em uma embarcação da reação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra il procedimento di Haber 
per la preparazione dell'ammoniaca usando l'azoto dall'aria e 
dall'idrogeno dal metano in un vaso di reazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει τη διαδικασία Haber 
για την αμμωνία χρησιμοποιώντας το άζωτο από τον αέρα και το 
υδρογόνο από το μεθάνιο αέριο σε ένα σκάφος αντίδρασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra el proceso de Haber para 
hacer el amoníaco usando el nitrógeno del aire y del hidrógeno del 
gas de metano en un recipiente de la reacción.</string>
          </description>
